text:
When asked if she would campaign with her husband, she replied: “stay tuned.”

Melania Trump joined her husband at a polling station in Palm Beach, Florida, on Tuesday, making a rare public appearance this election cycle.

When asked by a reporter if she would join the former president on the campaign trail, the former first lady simply smiled and replied, “stay tuned,” but nothing more.

After the vote, the Trumps walked away from reporters, smiling, arm in arm.

Wilfredo Lee/AP

Campaign advisers have previously released videos of the couple together at Mar-a-Lago at private events, most recently when they hosted Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban.

In December, Melania Trump spoke at a naturalization ceremony at the National Archives in Washington, but her husband did not attend the event with her.

During his campaign rallies, Donald Trump often brings up his wife’s criticism of his sometimes vulgar rhetoric and dance moves, saying she calls them “unprofessional.”

Pool via ABC News

In a September interview with NBC News, when Trump was asked about his wife’s campaign campaign with him, he responded that she would be there “soon” and “at the appropriate time,” but added that he liked to “keep her away”.

“She’s with Barron at school right now,” Trump said. “She loves this boy. She’s very popular, she actually is. And she’ll be with us. She’s very supportive.”

“Quite soon, when it is appropriate, but very soon,” he added. “She’s a private person, a great person, very trusting. And she loves our country very much. She will be – she will be when the time is right.”

“She’ll be there, and honestly, I like to keep her away. It’s so mean and so nasty,” Trump said.
title: Melania Trump makes rare appearance during 2024 election campaign
author: remon Buul
